alerts.title: Privilege Escalation Events
alerts.description: Privilege escalation: Add member to role - Global Administrator initiated by admin@contoso.com.
alerts.recommendation: Review Azure AD sign-in logs, enable MFA, and consider Conditional Access policies.

alerts.title: Brute Force / Failed Sign-in Attempts
alerts.description: User 'service-account@contoso.com' had 847 failed sign-in attempts from 23 distinct IPs on app 'Azure Portal'.
alerts.recommendation: Review Azure AD sign-in logs, enable MFA, and consider Conditional Access policies.

alerts.title: Brute Force / Failed Sign-in Attempts

alerts.title: Mass Resource Deletions
alerts.description: User 'deploy-bot@contoso.com' deleted 47 resources in one hour.
alerts.recommendation: Audit Azure Activity logs, review RBAC permissions, and enable resource locks on critical resources.
